item.title: CoreWeave’s stock gets a brief reprieve from the selling as Jane Street announces stake
item.description: The quantitative-trading firm revealed a 5.4% stake of nearly 20 million shares in CoreWeave.

item.title: Rotation out of Big Tech sends S&P 500 on longest losing streak since January. How far will it run?
item.description: Big Tech is dragging down the S&P 500, even as the broader universe of stocks in the index has been holding up so far this week.

item.title: Powell’s Jackson Hole speech could be make-or-break moment for the summer stock-market rally
item.description: Investors have all eyes fixed on the Federal Reserve’s annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyo., as the Fed charts the future direction of the ...

item.title: Who is Lisa Cook? A closer look at Trump’s new target at the Federal Reserve.
item.description: The first Black woman to sit on the U.S. central bank’s board has been ‘making an impact — not making headlines.’

item.title: The stock market may need ‘tariff checks’ to keep rallying — but the bond market wouldn’t like it
item.description: The idea of using collected tariffs for anything other than paying down the U.S.’s debt or funding its spending commitments isn’t terribly popular in ...
